traits.name: Extraordinary Feature
traits.desc:
The mongrelfolk has one of the following extraordinary features, determined randomly by rolling a d20 or chosen by the DM:
1–3: Amphibious. The mongrelfolk can breathe air and water.
4–9: Darkvision. The mongrelfolk has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.
10: Flight. The mongrelfolk has leathery wings and a flying speed of 40 feet.
11–15: Keen Hearing and Smell. The mongrelfolk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
16–17: Spider Climb. The mongrelfolk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
18–19: Standing Leap. The mongrelfolk's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
20: Two-Headed. The mongrelfolk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: The mongrelfolk can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mongrelfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw or dagger.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Rahadin

traits.name: Deathly Choir
traits.desc: Any creature within 10 feet of Rahadin that isn't protected by a mind blank spell hears in its mind the screams of the thousands of people Rahadin has killed. As a bonus action, Rahadin can force all creatures that can hear the screams to make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. Each creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Rahadin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.desc: Rahadin can attempt to hide even when he is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Rahadin attacks three times with his scimitar, or twice with his poisoned darts.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poisoned Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.
